subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin had two goals and an assist, and the Washington Capitals snapped a three-game losing streak with a 6-3 victory against the Penguins at Pittsburgh on Wednesday night.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin had two goals and an assist, and the Washington Capitals snapped a three-game losing streak with a 6-3 victory against the Penguins at Pittsburgh on Wednesday night.
